bioconda.name: bioconductor-uniquorn
bioconda.summary: Identification of cancer cell lines based on their weighted mutational/ variational fingerprint

biotools.summary: This packages enables users to identify cancer cell lines based on the locations of somatic and germline mutations. The implemented method is optimized for the next-generation whole exome and whole genome DNA-sequencing technology.

bioschemas.name: Uniquorn
bioschemas.summary: This packages enables users to identify cancer cell lines based on the locations of somatic and germline mutations. The implemented method is optimized for the next-generation whole exome and whole genome DNA-sequencing technology.
